name: 高能天文物理學
description: 介紹高能天文物理學的主要原理，高能天文學的進展以及最近的發現，以及如何配合不同波段的觀測來研究天文現象。
goals: 介紹高能天文物理學的主要原理，高能天文學的進展以及最近的發現，以及如何配合不同波段的觀測來研究天文現象。
syllabus:
1.  lecture introduction
2.  High energy astrophysics (HEA) and X-ray astronomy & beyond – observations and major breakthroughs
3.  HEA observatories – techniques and limitations
4.  Physical processes in HEA I
5.  Physical processes in HEA II
6.  HEA associated with stellar objects
7.  compact objects – white dwarfs and neutron stars
8.  X-ray binaries I
9.  X-ray binaries II
10.  supernovae
11.  Milky way and galaxies
12.  Extragalactic HEA – AGNs I
13.  Extragalactic HEA – AGNs II
14.  Extragalactic HEA – intracluster medium
15.  X-ray background and gamma-ray bursts (GRB)

grading.note: midterm/final exams, oral presentation, term essays, homework, class performance
